name: WildSim-ple
description:
A small and simple little wildlife simulator. Nothing fancy. The graphics are "programmer" art for testing mechanics. This project is entirely for experimental purposes as I needed to figure out how I would structure and blueprint the AI for a bigger project. There's also some work on better parent/child blueprint structuring I wanted to check before redoing part of the aforementioned bigger project.

I'll add more content/features if people enjoy/want more. Potential features I already have in mind: 
Choose your starting genetics, genetic upgrades after breeding, species customisation, better graphics, diegetic UI, other levels, etc

Controls are shown in-game, but you can play it with just the mouse if you want.

TLDR: Here's a little experimental game you can play if you like. 

Please consider donating, even if it's not much, it really helps and you'll have my undying appreciation. Thanks and enjoy!
